Text: This is my first comment, and I just want to say thanks to all the scanners and uploaders!!! I lost my job in Febuary and comics were the first to be cut back, But with all you wonderful people i can keep up with my series. I will be uploading scans of my own to help give back. SHIPS AHOY!!! SCAN THE MAN!!!
Has anyone found Deadpool: Suicide Kings #4? It was out the 22nd but no one seems to have to scans. Any info?
Deadpool: Suicide Kings #4 is scanned.  I'm sure it will be uploaded in the next pack
Oh, thank you very much! =) Thanks for brightening up my day.
Thanks, Shipjolly. Your stuff is great. I don't know if you have it, but I'm trying to find issue 30 of She-Hulk v2. I can not find it anywhere and it's driving me nuts.
